channel.title: Climatehyseria on Love Nature
channel.description: Recent content in Climatehyseria on Love Nature

item.title: A scam with devastating consequences
item.description: As a practicing nature protector, I spend lots of time in nature. I see tons of destruction going on - right now. Fire, chainsaw, … heart-breaking. What I never see is any sign of damage caused by climate change. None. It’s not there. But the destruction is real, and accellerating. What on earth is going on? Seasides haven’t grown, species have not moved or went extinct because of warming. All human related extinctions are due to habitat loss or poaching.
